default.reason: No severe symptoms detected in offline rules.

default.disclaimer: This is a decision-support tool, not a doctor. In case of severe symptoms or doubt, go to the nearest emergency facility immediately.

fever.reason: Fever lasting more than 48 hours requires evaluation.
fever.disclaimer: Seek emergency help if child is lethargic, has stiff neck, or persistent vomiting.

breathing difficulty.reason: Breathing difficulty is a red flag.
breathing difficulty.recommendedUrgency: Go to the nearest emergency facility immediately.
breathing difficulty.disclaimer: Call emergency services if breathing is rapidly worsening.

pregnancy bleeding.reason: Bleeding during pregnancy is an emergency.
pregnancy bleeding.disclaimer: Ensure someone accompanies the patient to the hospital.
